name: Ferrari Challenge: Trofeo Pirelli
description:
Nintendo.com Description (from Ad Blurbs)



Compete in the most elite racing circuit with the premier racing vehicle line in the world: Ferrari.

Get ready for a totally immersive, realistic, gripping experience with authentic cars, tracks, vehicle damage, and racing dynamics that are second to none. This is one racing game that has been precision balanced to perfection.

  • Five modes of play including Versus and Replay.
  • World-renowned racing venues.
  • Intuitive Assist function
  • Broadcast style camera angles
  • Full Distance Replay
